Name: Spooky Scary Skeletons_upgraded
Description: THE ENEMY IS [vanish]SPOOKED|(Always offered as scrap)

Name: Burn to Disc
Description: Set your CPU to 0[;]|but [fire]burn all new dice

Name: Burn to Disc_downgraded
Description: Reduce CPU by 6[;]|but [fire]burn all new dice

Name: Cryostasis
Description: Halve CPU counter[;]|and [ice]freeze all new dice

Name: Cryostasis_upgraded
Description: Reduce CPU to 1/3[;]|and [ice]freeze all new dice

Name: Cryostasis_downgraded
Description: Reduce CPU by 3[;]|and [ice]freeze all new dice

Name: Vanish Grip
Script: On Execute: var bigdice = 0; var smalldice = 7; for(ad in actualdice) { if(ad.basevalue > bigdice) bigdice = ad.basevalue; if(ad.basevalue < smalldice) smalldice = ad.basevalue; } if((bigdice - smalldice) >= 1) givedice((bigdice - smalldice)|~combinedice~); inflict(~ncr_vanish~); sfx(~_vanish~|~~|0.2);

Name: Vanish Grip_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var bigdice = 0; var smalldice = 7; for(ad in actualdice) { if(ad.basevalue > bigdice) bigdice = ad.basevalue; if(ad.basevalue < smalldice) smalldice = ad.basevalue; } if((bigdice - smalldice) >= 1) givedice((bigdice - smalldice)|~combinedice~); inflict(~ncr_vanish~); sfx(~_vanish~|~~|0.2);

Name: Vanish Grip_downgraded
Script: On Execute: var bigdice = 0; var smalldice = 7; for(ad in actualdice) { if(ad.basevalue > bigdice) bigdice = ad.basevalue; if(ad.basevalue < smalldice) smalldice = ad.basevalue; } if((bigdice - smalldice) >= 1) givedice((bigdice - smalldice)|~combinedice~);

Name: Greek Fire
Script: On Execute: if(getstatus(VANISH) > 0) { attack(d + target.dice + target.extradice + target.bonusdice|VANISH); sfxdamage(target|d + target.dice + target.extradice + target.bonusdice); } else { attack(d + getstatus(~ncr_vanish~) | VANISH); sfxdamage(target|d + getstatus(~ncr_vanish~) ); } sfx(~_vanish~);

Name: Greek Fire_upgraded
Script: On Execute: if(getstatus(VANISH) > 0) { attack(d + target.dice + target.extradice + target.bonusdice|VANISH); sfxdamage(target|d + target.dice + target.extradice + target.bonusdice); } else { attack(d + getstatus(~ncr_vanish~) | VANISH); sfxdamage(target|d + getstatus(~ncr_vanish~) ); } sfx(~_vanish~);

Name: Quickslime
Script: On Execute: if(getstatus(~ncr_vanish~)>0 # getstatus(VANISH) > 0){removestatus(~ncr_vanish~|1); inflict(LOCK|1); sfx(~_lock~);} else{self.textparticle(~No effect!~);}

Name: Quickslime_upgraded
Script: On Execute: if(getstatus(~ncr_vanish~)>0 # getstatus(VANISH) > 0){removestatus(~ncr_vanish~|1); inflict(LOCK|1); sfx(~_lock~);} else{self.textparticle(~No effect!~);}

Name: Quickslime_downgraded
Script: On Execute: if(getstatus(~ncr_vanish~)>0 # getstatus(VANISH) > 0){removestatus(~ncr_vanish~|1); inflict(LOCK|1); sfx(~_lock~);} else{self.textparticle(~No effect!~);}
